pullrequest.title: Implement virtual evidence for all segway tasks

content.raw:
@{5ac790531b5dd37ea53a123d} I’m curious, why use this comparison instead of the one I implemented in my version \(which uses the machine epsilon\)?: [#!/hoffmanlab/segway/pull-requests/98/implement-virtual-evidence-during-training/diff#Lsegway/observations.pyT390](#!/hoffmanlab/segway/pull-requests/98/implement-virtual-evidence-during-training/diff#Lsegway/observations.pyT390)

Additionally, I took a cursory look and some of the code in this function looks different from my current implementation. I made some bug fixes to a few functions after my initial PR, so it should be checked that those updates are implemented here as well \(they can be seen easily by looking at the last few commits on [my PR](#!/hoffmanlab/segway/pull-requests/98/implement-virtual-evidence-during-training)\).
content.html:
@Matthew McNeil I’m curious, why use this comparison instead of the one I implemented in my version (which uses the machine epsilon)?: #!/hoffmanlab/segway/pull-requests/98/implement-virtual-evidence-during-training/diff#Lsegway/observations.pyT390

Additionally, I took a cursory look and some of the code in this function looks different from my current implementation. I made some bug fixes to a few functions after my initial PR, so it should be checked that those updates are implemented here as well (they can be seen easily by looking at the last few commits on my PR).
